# Postman 中文文档

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/postman-zhongwen-wendang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/postman-zhongwen-wendang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install postman-zhongwen-wendang
postman-zhongwen-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g postman-zhongwen-wendang
postman-zhongwen-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
